content: the yin-yang cat bed is a 22 inch pet bed made with super bulky chenille yarn it s sure to be a favorite of any feline friend and encourage piles of peaceful kitty cuddles inspired by the traditional yin-yang symbol and my daughter s two cats this pet bed looks great in any two colors - you don t have to stick to just black and white this cat and dog bed features a round shape that offers a safe cozy place for your pet to snooze and soft walls to promote security this border is created by a simple fabric fold over making the yin-yang cat bed easy to throw in the washer and dryer the yin-yang cat bed is a 22 inch pet bed made with super bulky chenille it s sure to be a favorite of any feline friend and encourage piles of peaceful kitty cuddles inspired by the traditional yin-yang symbol and my daughter s two cats this pet bed looks great in any two colors - you don t have to stick to just black and white this cat and dog bed features a round shape that offers a safe cozy place for your pet to snooze and soft walls to promote security this border is created by a simple fabric fold over making the yin-yang cat bed easy to throw in the washer and dryer
